body.name: FelixKing Office Chair, Ergonomic Desk Chair with Adjustable Height and Lumbar Support Swivel Lumbar Support Desk Computer Chair with Flip up Armrests for Conference Room (Black)

features: [ Ergonomic Design ] The mesh back of FelixKing’s chair has excellent elasticity, completely suitable for the waist and back curve. It provides comfortable support which helps you to maintain a relaxed posture in a long hours of work. It is easier to disperse pressure and relieve muscle fatigue.

[ Comfortable Surface ] The surface of FelixKing’s chair is composed of high-density natural sponge which is designed for the curve of human’s butt. It can provide a larger bearing area and can reduce body’s pain. With thick handrails and a high density mesh for excellent ventilation makes your sitting more comfortable.It can also protect your lumbar spine and back

[ Convenient Storage ] Lift the armrest, it can be putted under the table. It saves your space and can be easily stored. The armrest can be rotated 90 degrees to relax the muscles and have fun at the same time.It’s suitable for living room, study room, meeting room and office.

[ Multi-Function ] The height of the chair can be adjusted according to the height of the desk and the height of the person sitting on it. It also features 360 degree rotation. With the feature of 30 degrees of recline and structure of distributing the pressure-resistant, it can reduce your body's pressure. Promote your own blood circulation.A durable caster can be easily moved elsewhere.

[ Simple Assembly] It can be assembled with the simple tools that come with packing. You can easily complete it in about 15 minutes according to the English instructions.The warranty is one year.If you have any problems, please contact us at any time, and the customer service will provide customers with satisfactory solutions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Four Points Upgrade 2 Ergonomic Backrest Chair 3 Multi-Adjustable Chair 4 Flip-up Armrests 5 Soft and Wide Seat

Ergonomic chair back The mesh backrest has excellent elasticity and fits the waist and back curve completely, providing comfortable support and improving back fatigue. Adjustable lumbar support By adjusting the butterfly part, the position of the waist support point can be changed, and the height can be adjusted up and down about 5cm. High-elastic mesh It has good ventilation and flexibility, and is not easy damaged. Long lasting. Because of good ventilation, it can be used in any season. Thicker and wider cushions Thick high-density natural sponge, thicker and wider seat cushion are soft to skin. Even if you sit for a long time, you won't sweat from work.

Thick armest It is gentle to the skin, protects the elbow, is softer, has good ventilation, not easy to sweat, is a popular handrail design by customers. Three-stage air rod More durable, safer and supportive. Stronger bearing capacity Its five-clawed base can evenly distribute the pressure applied to it, always remaining stable and reducing the sound when sliding. Protect the floor PU casters, with silent effects, do not damage the floor, with protection. It moves quietly and smoothly, so don't worry about disturbing your mood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price, comfy, easy assembly
reviews.reviewText: I got this chair to work from home and had a limited budget. This chair is comfortable, rolls well on my rug and hard flooring, is breathable, and very sturdy. I assembled the chair myself in less than 30 minutes. The back support is adjustable and the arms flip up so you have a variety of options there. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Comfortable - Like Features
reviews.reviewText: Just received the chair. It was easy to assemble with the supplied Allen wrench and appears to be good quality. It is very comfortable and I especially like the adjustable lumbar support and the tilt back features. The casters work much better on the chair mat (over carpeted foor). I did have some difficulty initially adjusting the lever to activate the tilt back, but that could be due only to my getting to know the chair better. Overall I am very happy with this purchase. Good quality and competently priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Low cost, easy to assemble, seat is a little shorter than most chairs I've had
reviews.reviewText: Just received and assembled.This was the easiest assembly I ever had for an office chair. I really liked that.It appears to be well made and sturdy.I didn't want to spend a lot of money because I've had $470 chairs go bad on me after two years. This is now my sixth office chair for my family of which two people use the chairs. If I get over two years out of this one I will consider it a win.The design is what I prefer because the arms attach toward the back which allows my legs to lay comfortably toward the sides and not be pinched.The seat cushion is very firm so it should hold up well over time. Because the seat sits back under the chair back it limits the depth of the seat so the seat doesn't extend out to where I am accustomed to on the other chairs I have had. It is still fine and I think I will get used to the new feel.On other chairs I have had the backs have split, the main post has broken off nearly sending me to the floor and the piston has lost it's lift ability.This chair has some heavy duty plastic that I don't think will split like the chair I had split because of a thin plastic area in the design. The chair tips back nicely but not super far which is what caused the post to bend and break on one of my chairs. Of the five previous chairs I've had only one lost it's piston pressure due to what was probably a bad seal. I had a two year warranty on one of my $470 dollar chairs and the warranty completely replaced the chair so the warranty was a good deal that time.The assembly of the seat to the arms is very tight so you will need a little muscle to push it into place so the screws line up. This was the most difficult part of the assembly. I would not recommend paying for assembly on this chair because of the simplicity of putting it together. If you don't feel comfortable doing the assembly yourself, have a handy neighbor assist and know that it will be a breeze for them.I am well pleased with this chair right now and hope it holds up well for the next two year or so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The FelixKing Office Chair Simple and Supportive!
reviews.reviewText: When I got this chair, I saw the typical parts list and nuts & bolts. I hate these products. I hate having to put things together because I always end up with additional parts from the toolkit. Well, to my surprise there were exactly the number of pieces identified on the list, that were needed to put the chair together. The additional parts I did find, were listed as such. Looking at the chair, upon assembly, its very skeletonized, so I was worried about support for my lower back. The chair has adjustments for that which actually work. The rollers are smooth and the piston doesn't wobble in the base of the chair or the wheelbase. All around, for the price this is a nice chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fell apart after just two weeks. Completely unusable, unsafe, and unreliable. And UNRESOLVED
reviews.reviewText: Chair went together easy enough, and has been comfortable to sit in. However...Today, it got rather wobbly, and I noticed several chunks of a hard black plastic material on the floor beneath it. I am not thinking that this is going to last much longer. I have used this chair for 2 weeks only.Update 6/9 - Chair completely unusable. Support has not responded to either request for warranty assistance (suspense date 6/2), or for return assistance. I have since changed the rating to 1 star because I cannot change it to 0 stars.I have since replaced this chair with a completely different manufacturer/supplier. Since the seller won't respond, and I don't really see a way to have Amazon interface, it will collect dust in the basement until I find a way to strip it for parts, repair it myself, or just put it on the curb for trash collection.This is hard for me to say, because I usually try to stay positive and review products when they meet or exceed my expectations, but next time I consider buying an office chair from FelixKing, I'll just set $171.19 on fire and drop a brick on my toes. Perhaps that experience will help me remember how unpleasant this one has been.Update 8/7 - Nobody contacted me. Ever. I replaced this with a vastly superior chair from GT Racing, I invite you to consider doing the same! https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08M6254X9?psc=1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very ergonomic chair, lovely look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No assembly instruction included
reviews.reviewText: The chair seems fine. Study. The tilt adjustment is stiff. No assemble instructions were provided. Had to figure assembly on my own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this chair for a few months and I sit in it 8+ hours a day five days a week. It is wide enough to sit comfortably and the lumbar adjustment is nice. The seat and armrest material can be uncomfortable on sensitive skin if you are wearing shorts or lean in on the arm rest. It will leave a pattern. I placed a blanket down and it's not an issue at all. The back is breathable so no sweaty back when I choose to sit ergonomicly. It tilts back but not so much that you'll feel like you are falling back and it rolls decent on the carpet. I really like that the arm fold up so my chair fits all the way under my desk at the end of the day.
Buen ajuste lumbar. Cómoda. Un poco elevado el precio al ser un producto chino.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good Looking, easy to assembler, Comfy and great feature.
reviews.reviewText: I'm so happy that I found this chair! If your wife is OCD on matching colour (black and white) like in my case, this chair would be perfect and for sure will get her approval!The seating area is black so it won't be easy to get dirty and trim is white so it matches my toys and my desk.There are few points I like about the chairs after a week of using it:1. The fabric is very breathable, definitely make it easy if you are working from home and seat on it for long time2. The arm rest can be flipped up. As seems in the pic, it allow me to sit closing to the desk and not blocking me at all.3. The adjustable height range is great. Anyone in my house has no issue sitting on it.With the price, the look, features and quality of the chair, I would definitely recommend this chair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: A great chair if you work from home
reviews.reviewText: I have had this office chair for 2 weeks, I assembled the chair by myself, it was easy for me to follow the instruction. I like the colour (black), there is no difference but just my preference. It's very comfortable and it supports my back for long hours sitting. Overall, its a great office chair with a reasonable price. I would strongly recommend this product to anymore who works from home or who has problem with back.

It was easy to put together and I love the back support! I have a pretty bad back so it was great to sit down on the chair and feel relief. There were no marks or scraps on the chair. It's a beautiful color combination too.

reviews.reviewTitle: 組み立て簡単、軽量、快適！
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. 構成部品少ない、組み立て簡単、説明書みなくて一人で20分出来上がった。部品軽い、女性でも組み立てできる。アームの下側左右を書いている、組み立て間違えはない。固定ネジの先端部ノリを付いている、長時間使ってもネジの外れはないと思う。在宅ワークのため3週間前で買って、ほぼ毎日使っています。長時間座ってもお尻痛くない。背中がクッション付いていますが、通気性がいい、汗だれがない。また、アーム付いているので、腕が楽に仕事できます。安くて、いい椅子と思います。
